name: Glowmonkey vs. Meltdown
summary: A top view Flash flying/shooting game... Glowmonkey must stop his nemesis, Dolly Lamba, from destroying the earth. Dolly is melting all of the snow on Greenland, and he has taken Glowmonkey's friend, Purple Polar Bear, hostage. Destroy enemy aircraft, subs, robots, and base to save your buddy and the World!
